name: MindBloc
description:
*********************Gameplay********************

Players need to change all the ground to green within the specified number of times.

Each level will have a special shape provided to the player, and the player needs to make full use of the shape provided by the game to change the color of the ground.

*********************Game Control********************

The game only needs the mouse to click the correct position.

*********************Game Features********************

>> Easy to learn, simple mouse controls

>>Very suitable for relaxing yourself after a heavy game

>> Some logical thinking challenge, but not overly complex

*I used Google Translate, it may not be standard, but I hope you can understand what I want to express
